content:
Mid-century modern coffee tables are a great addition to any living room! I'd be happy to help you find the perfect one. Here are some online marketplaces and websites where you can find mid-century modern coffee tables:

**1. West Elm**

* Website: [www.westelm.com](http://www.westelm.com)
* Filter by: "Mid-Century Modern" under "Style" and "Coffee Tables" under "Furniture"

**2. Crate & Barrel**

* Website: [www.crateandbarrel.com](http://www.crateandbarrel.com)
* Filter by: "Mid-Century Modern" under "Style" and "Coffee Tables" under "Furniture"

**3. AllModern**

* Website: [www.allmodern.com](http://www.allmodern.com)
* Filter by: "Mid-Century Modern" under "Style" and "Coffee Tables" under "Furniture"

**4. Wayfair**

* Website: [www.wayfair.com](http://www.wayfair.com)
* Filter by: "Mid-Century Modern" under "Style" and "Coffee Tables" under "Furniture"

**5. Chairish**

* Website: [www.chairish.com](http://www.chairish.com)
* Filter by: "Mid-Century Modern" under "Style" and "Coffee Tables" under "Furniture"
* Note: Chairish is a vintage and used furniture marketplace, so you may find unique, one-of-a-kind pieces.

**6. 1stdibs**

* Website: [www.1stdibs.com](http://www.1stdibs.com)
* Filter by: "Mid-Century Modern" under "Style" and "Coffee Tables" under "Furniture"
* Note: 1stdibs is a luxury online marketplace featuring high-end, unique, and often vintage pieces.

**7. Etsy**

* Website: [www.etsy.com](http://www.etsy.com)
* Filter by: "Mid-Century Modern" under "Style" and "Coffee Tables" under "Furniture"
* Note: Etsy is a marketplace for handmade, vintage, and unique items, so you may find one-of-a-kind coffee tables.

**8. eBay**

* Website: [www.ebay.com](http://www.ebay.com)
* Filter by: "Mid-Century Modern" under "Style" and "Coffee Tables" under "Furniture"
* Note: eBay is an online auction site, so be prepared to bid on items.

**9. Craigslist**

* Website: [www.craigslist.org](http://www.craigslist.org)
* Filter by: "Mid-Century Modern" under "Furniture" and "Coffee Tables"
* Note: Craigslist is a local online marketplace, so you'll need to search for listings in your area. Be cautious when purchasing from individuals.

**10. Local vintage and antique stores**

* Visit local vintage and antique stores in your area, as they may carry mid-century modern coffee tables or be able to custom order one for you.

When searching online, make sure to read reviews, check the return and shipping policies, and ask questions about the product before making a purchase. Good luck in your search, and I hope you find the perfect mid-century modern coffee table!
